storyInfo: In a remote wilderness town, Provence realizes that Catastrophes may not be as chilling as the human hearts stained in the shadow of Catastrophe.

attributes.content: Siv! The detector's showing one more person up ahead!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Think you can hang in there?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Huff... Huff... I'm fine, let's go...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: This place is way too remote, and wasn't in the area covered by the infrared detector...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I applied to advance the range one kilometer this way, and discovered a survivor nearby, but haven't pinpointed the precise location yet. Hurry, hurry...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: This town is clearly within the local Catastrophe Messenger's detection range, so how did this happen?!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: An earthquake of this magnitude should've had obvious signs. There's no way anyone stationed here could've missed it.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: It's already been four and a half days. I'm starting to think it might be...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Besides, Rhodes Island was just passing by, and we're not at all prepared for this level of rescue operation.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Don't talk like that!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Let's go. There's still hope.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Here, right here! They should be under the rubble. Hurry up, Siv!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: This is the rescue team! Do you hear me? We're from the rescue team, we're here to help you!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Can you hear me? Please answer!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: No response. Siv, try tapping a steel pipe!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Tap tap tap, tap tap tap...
Tap tap tap, tap tap tap...
Any response?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: None... And we weren't assigned a life-detector. Is there a better way of confirming the exact location? There were survivors before who just didn't have the strength to respond. Maybe I should apply for a—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Ugh... It'll be too late by then. Plus, there's no guarantee they even have any to spare. We'll do this the old-fashioned way. Listen carefully—even the scratching of fingernails makes a sound.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I'll try tapping the pipes over there. Or do you have any Originium Arts that can help locate them?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Haha... If I did, then I wouldn't be digging through rubble with my bare hands...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Tap tap tap, tap tap tap...
I've knocked on this entire area and didn't get any responses.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: It's been so long, and this place is so remote. Were we... too late again?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: No... there's still another place up ahead. I'll go over and take a look.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Tap tap tap, tap tap tap...
*Scratch*... *Scratch*...
*Scratch*... *Scratch*...
I hear it! It's the sound of nails on pipe!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Here, over here! Hurry, Siv!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I'm coming! ...Gah! Hiss...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Careful! Take a break if you can't handle it anymore!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I'm fine, I can keep going. We've got a life to save!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Can you hear me? We're from the rescue team, we're here to help you!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Here, let's move this board out of the way. Careful not to hurt yourself. Three, two, one!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hnngh!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: We should still have some saline solution left, so let's pass it down with a hose.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: There's saline water on the way! Drink up, and we'll begin the rescue!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: It's an elderly person?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Granny?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Ugh... I thought... nobody would come...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: No way! We're here for you!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Thank goodness...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: I've already started scanning the structure with radar. Hold on just a little longer!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Granny? Granny?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: She's losing consciousness! We can't let her fall asleep here!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I'll handle the scan. Head over and keep her awake!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Granny, Granny? Don't go to sleep just yet, let's have a little chat first!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: It's dangerous to fall asleep right now. Wake up, and we'll talk, okay?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: How many days has it been...?
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: ...Um, two! Two days! We were nearby and came as soon as we could! Everything will be okay!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: My grandson... Have you seen my grandson?
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: (Have you seen him? Any young kids?)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (No, I haven't...)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Granny, we're divided into teams who are all responsible for different areas. Maybe another team has already taken him to safety. We'll have a look after we get you out of here!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: My grandson... is a little troublemaker...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: I don't know where he's run off to...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: Don't you worry, I'm sure he's just fine!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (Looks like they also raised fowlbeasts here. The coop has collapsed, and there's nothing left.)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Granny, your grandson must've been real lucky. Is that a fowlbeast coop I see over there? I love me some fowlbeast eggs!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Is that so... Oh my... little fowlbeasts... golden and shiny...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: The eggs... are probably crushed now...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: If there are any left... you can try some...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: Don't worry, it'll be fine! I'm sure we can have some later!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: You're the 30th person we've rescued today. We just dug through an entire house somewhere else, and rescued a whole family...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Mm... Mm...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: (Is the scan done yet?)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (Here you go.)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (Is the sinking severe?)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (...It's messy.)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (The sinking's already begun over here, but the other side of the house hasn't collapsed. Probably a different soil layer. The terrain here is... complex. The seismic waves were reflected by its shape as they passed through.)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (The whole house is twisted, and if this side is demolished, the other will lose its support and collapse. It's not an option.)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (Do we seriously have to dismantle and clear out the other side first, just to ensure stability?)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (Do we have time for that...?)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (Not a chance in hell. It's too big of a job for just the two of us anyway.)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (We'll have to talk the old lady through it first, but... if we clear out what we can and think on our feet, there might still be a way.)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Huff... Huff... Ugh...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Ever seen a Lupo before, Granny?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: We'll remove the stuff on top first, clean up a little, and get you out of there!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Then you'll get to see a purple Lupo with the biggest, bushiest tail there is!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: You know it! Once you're out, you can pat my tail! I bet you've never seen one as big as mine!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Mm... Mm...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: Hurry up, she can't hold out much longer.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Don't fall asleep just yet! You know, my grandma is about the same age as you... And I want to try some of those eggs too!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I've already cleared all the rubble that can be safely removed. Next I'll try propping up this beam. You think it'll be stable enough?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Three, two, one... Hup!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: No good! It's already starting to loosen!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Let's try over here then!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I'll hold up the middle. Head over and chip off that half while I support the other half!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Alright, just tell me when you're reaching your limits.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Don't panic, Granny, we'll... we'll definitely to save you!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: One more time! I'm going to knock down this section!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Nngh! So... just you wait! We'll go find your grandson once you're safe!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Keep it steady!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: We've already cleared one of the beams, Granny! Hang in there!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hang in there, hang in there... The beam over here, once it's cleared...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Granny?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Don't fall asleep!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I can't...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: Two days is... a pretty long time...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: Don't... worry about me...
attributes.name: Old Granny

attributes.content: No, don't say that! Keep going, Provence!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Can you still hear her breathing underneath? She hasn't responded for a while now...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: It's been too long. Let's stop.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: She's probably already...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: No, no! No!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Provence squad? Survivors have been found near point 28, 575. Please hurry.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: ...We've received new coordinates. 1673, 589. One victim, about 2.7 meters deep. Heavy equipment is needed to dismantle the rubble.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: We'll head straight there... Mhm, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. We're... We're going to rescue someone else.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Let's go, Siv. We've got someone else to save. The team responsible for finding the casualties will come around later.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Are you okay...?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaaargh!!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Aaaaaagh!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Stop it! You're not good at—
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaaargh!!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I'm going to dig her out!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: *gasp*... *gasp*...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Stop, Siv! You're only destroying your own health, and it's not helping anyone! There are still so many more people to save!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: No! I have to—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Aaaaaagh!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I told you, stop!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What more do you want?! Are you going to sacrifice yourself here? Nothing we do will change the situation! Don't sacrifice yourself for someone who's already dead!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: We still have others to save! And until we do, your own life takes priority!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: We need to go, now! We can't afford to fall behind!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: The team searching for casualties will be here soon. We'll ask where the old lady ended up later, okay? There's someone else waiting for us.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Someone once told me that to save more people, you must first protect your own life.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: No matter what happens, you must always value your own life... All lives are equally important, including your own.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: So let's go. Together.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Over here! Found another one over here!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hang in there a bit longer! Hold onto my hand, we'll have you out soon!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Alright, you're safe now!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Your family? Don't worry, see that tent up front? All our personnel should be over there, so go take a look!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: If you have any questions, you can talk to any of the operators there and they'll be glad to help you!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Don’t you worry!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: It's okay, calm down. I assure you, you won't have to pay for the treatment.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yes, yes, I guarantee it. Just sit over there and don't go running off again.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No need to be nervous. You'll be fine.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm too tired to even speak.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Same.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: It's quiet here... Brush away the rocks and come lie down.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Ugh... Ow ow ow, my waist... Ah...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: How many... did we manage to save today...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Dunno... I feel like I can't move a muscle...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: But I still find it so weird...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What's weird?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I've been thinking... We're in Victoria, right? This place is pretty remote, but the town's not exactly small, and there was supposed to be a Catastrophe Messenger here.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Uh huh...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: So how did all this happen? No Catastrophe Messenger could've failed to detect a Catastrophe of this scale, even if it wasn't obvious.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: No idea... Maybe they skimped on the disaster avoidance procedures...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: No way... What happened here wasn't just poorly done. It's more like... there were no efforts at all.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Everyone was basically trapped in their homes. No way they'd be indoors if they knew a Catastrophe was coming.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Maybe some kind of fringe belief about accepting Catastrophes...? None of it makes any sense.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Maybe they just didn't believe what their Catastrophe Messenger had to say... That happens too, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, it happens... and I've been there myself. But a whole town? Never.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Ugh... So many dead...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: ...How could I... not know... who...
...Right now... they...
...Why... you... should have...
There are still people over there? I'll ask them to come rest with us.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (They're not with Rhodes Island?)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (Townsfolk?)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: (Not sure. Doesn't seem like it? The locals should all be recovering in the tents. What are they doing all the way out here?)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (Should we sneak a peek?)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: We already got the money. What now?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Bloody hell! You're the one who said to put on a show and make it convincing! Who the hell would care if a Catastrophe Messenger wasn't at the site of the disaster? 'Struggled to evacuate everyone but couldn't make it in time' my ass, now I'm all covered in soot!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Look at what happened! The box is buried under the house. Where's the money now, huh? Under a pile of bloody rubble, that's where! You gonna go dig it up?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Was it really okay to cause this big of a scene?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: The hell are you talking about? Now's the best time for us to bounce! Everything's a bloody mess outside, so hurry up and dig out the money so we can leave by tonight!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Change our names, leave the country. This money should last for a while, and with so many bloody Catastrophes everywhere, there'll never be a shortage of ways to make more.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: So stop dilly-dallying and dig it up already! I'm covered head-to-toe in dust, and you expect me to do it?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: (Those bastards...!)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (It's not that the townspeople didn't believe it, they weren't even warned!)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (They... got all those people killed!)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: (Wait, cool your jets!)
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hold it right there!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Who the hell are you?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: That uniform... From that rescue organization...?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: It doesn't matter who I am, but you're not getting out of here!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Dereliction of duty! And you call yourself a Catastrophe Messenger?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Think this kid overheard us? We can't have him spilling the beans!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Provence squad here. Is this the landship? Requesting field op support at 683, 447.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Our goal is just to detain them... Don't go overboard.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Provence, we finished our investigation...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: What's wrong? You don't look so good.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: So, you're already aware of what happened.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Here's the rub: the Catastrophe Messenger DID report this... to the nobles. If that's true, the only error is that many people who should've been taking refuge died instead.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: But as you know, nobles... don't exactly care about human lives, as long as there are enough left to collect taxes from.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: And these two scumbags are on the nobles' side. If they grease the right palms, they might even be spared from legal action.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: We're leaving the day after tomorrow, first thing in the morning. We only stopped here for the rescue operation, and we don't have the luxury of getting involved in some drawn-out court case.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: ...So you're saying that's it? We should just give up, because there's a chance we might not get the outcome we want?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: No... That's not what I'm saying.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Why do you have to make me feel like the bad guy here?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I REALLY don't want hear that from you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: There was no need for any of those people to lose their lives. Not a single one should've died! I, I...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Suing them is one thing, but I've seen their victims with my own eyes... Those people who should not have died...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: If we just walk away, how are we supposed to make those bastards pay for this? For all the lives they snatched away?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I get where you're coming from... But we'll still be bringing a case against them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: We've already prepared the documents, but there's no telling what the result might be. And we can't afford to wait either, just for the sake of intervening in a process that we're far from sure will produce a favorable outcome.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: So you're telling us to not get our hopes up...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I suppose I've been naive about this from the start.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: What's the point of even filing it then? Forget the death penalty, they'll probably get away with a small payment and a slap on the wrist. It'll mean nothing to them, and make us look like fools.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Damn it all! All those people, dying for nothing!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I know it's a bitter pill to swallow.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Let's not overthink this and focus on what we CAN do.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Let me see those documents. We're leaving the morning after, right?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Around 10 AM.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I won't be leaving with you then.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What will you do...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Only what I should do... What I can do.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Excuse me, sir, are you the judge here? I'm Provence, Rhodes Island Operator—
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: —Don't bother me!
attributes.name: Local Judge A

attributes.content: Can't you see we're busy with repairs here?!
attributes.name: Local Judge A

attributes.content: I know, but it's really important and—
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I told you not to bother me!
attributes.name: Local Judge A

attributes.content: Hello, is anyone here? I'm Provence, Rhodes Island Operator.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Nobody's in, huh...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: She left. Don't open the door for strangers at times like these! You never know what kind of misfortune you might invite!
Thank you so much for letting me in. These are Rhodes Island's documents regarding the Catastrophe. We wanted to file an action against the Catastrophe Messenger Whelan...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Ah!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: File for legal action? With me? Matters concerning Catastrophe Messengers should be brought to the High Court, and it's up to their discretion whether to...
attributes.name: Local Judge B

attributes.content: I know, I know, but can you hear me out first? Just take a look at these documents, please!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: ...I suppose I can do that.
attributes.name: Local Judge B

attributes.content: So there's the situation. We're holding two of them at Rhodes Island for now, but we don't have the right to detain them indefinitely. Besides, we're leaving the day after tomorrow.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: If this is turned over to the High Court, the nobles might just refuse to even hear it. This is brought up in the documents as well—the case may well be left without a conclusion.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Exploiting Catastrophes to make money, trampling over peoples' lives, knowing the horrors to come yet deliberately not informing people—only truly vile people would do these things!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: To him this was simply a way to make money. If he cannot be punished under the law, in a situation we can control, who knows how many more murders he will go on to commit?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Local Judge B

attributes.content: But... even if I do file the case at the local level, once it's submitted up the chain, it may inevitably end up...
attributes.name: Local Judge B

attributes.content: I'll inform the townspeople! I'll get in touch with the locals, and even people from neighboring towns! I'll take care of all that!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Local Judge B

attributes.content: Alright, I'll see what I can do. Given the situation... I can apply for a higher court to accept the case after about half a month.
attributes.name: Local Judge B

attributes.content: Thank you so much, Mr. Tal! I'll go hand the culprits over to a security guard. Please, send me a Messenger as soon as you get a follow-up!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Here's the temporary shelter for the townspeople we rescued...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Sorry for bothering you, everyone, but I have an announcement to make!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Oh, it's the purple lass! She rescued me with one of her buddies!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: I am a Catastrophe Messenger and one of the Rhodes Island operators involved in the rescue operation. The earthquake was indeed a Catastrophe, but the local Catastrophe Messenger failed to inform you!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Instead, he took advantage of it—and your very lives—to make money. Yesterday, he was going to flee with the cash in hand!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Where is he now?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: We'll kill the bastard!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Judge Tal will be reviewing the case, but the nobles may let it go unresolved in order to help the two criminals escape the reach of the law. Therefore, I would like to ask this of all of you—
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Can we work together to keep the nobles from interfering in this case?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Alright! You saved my life, lassie. Whatever you say, we're behind you!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: But how is that even possible...? How can we get the nobles to listen to us?
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Lass! Do you think we'll have enough people?
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: What if I recruited people from other towns too?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Maybe... but even that might not be enough to persuade the nobles!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Yeah. When have they ever lifted a finger for us?
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: I... I'll do whatever I can!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: This is the center of town.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hello? Excuse me, I'm from the next town over...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What? I'm busy right now, so scram!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: The neighboring town was just hit by a Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Catastrophes, huh? Yeah, we get plenty around here too! Lost half the town to one. Thought we'd never seen one before?
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: I know! And they can be avoided, but because of the Catastrophe Messenger—
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Whatever, I've heard enough. I told you, I don't have time for this!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Excuse me, the neighboring town suffered a terrible tragedy because their Catastrophe Messenger hid the truth from them. We hope you can support us in preventing the nobles from interfering with the case...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Is that supposed to be a joke? Where's the punchline?
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: No, I'm serious! We're planning to escalate the case, so if you're—
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: You wish.
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Yes, so that's what happened... Please, are you able to help us? We really need all the help we can get...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Thank you so much! Here's my contact information; I'll be reaching out in about half a month!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Thank you so much!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hello, I was wondering...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you, but...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Thank you so much! I'll be contacting you in about half a month!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Four months later...
Provence! There's a letter for you!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I wonder who'd be writing me...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.text: Good day. \r\n\r\nThis is Tal, the judge from the town you helped out before. It is with great excitement that I write this letter to you, and I hope it reaches you soon.

Through our efforts, Whelan and his accomplice have been sentenced to death. They are to be executed in the rebuilt town square tomorrow morning, as of this writing. The blood money they applied for was used in the post-Catastrophe reconstruction, and things have been gradually improving.

Also, the townspeople asked me to pass on their greetings. They are truly appreciative for everything you've done, and we wish the best for you and Rhodes Island. Bless you, and stay safe. \r\n\r\nTal

attributes.content: Take a look at this.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Remember that town that suffered an earthquake? They sent a letter.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: They did it... They...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: They really did it?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Yeah... They really did it.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Really? They got the sentence?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I never thought... I didn't think it was possible, but you...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Stop bawling your eyes out already. Here, a handkerchief.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: *sob*... Ugh, th-thank you...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Is this the reason you were away from the landship for so long, Provence?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: More or less. It wasn't quick, that's for sure...
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I never knew... I, I've been wallowing in misery, but you...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: I'm such a letdown.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Don't say that. Practically speaking, we couldn't really intervene in what happened afterwards.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: But call this my own selfishness. I just couldn't leave things hanging like that.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: And even if we did manage to secure some kind of justice... It's still too late for those who already suffered in the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Ugh, but that's enough of that! Let's pay a visit to that Granny's grave some time.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: I'd like to put some yellow rocks in front of her resting place... to remind her of all those little fowlbeasts she raised...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: Mhm, let's do that then. I'm sure she'd be happy.
attributes.name: Provence
